name: SACRED FAMILY
description:
The first game in the trilogy "Human Values". 
Short horror point and click game (about 10-15 minutes) about family reunion.

 A surrealistic horror game about relationships within the family. Examine the old family house and help your parents.

Features:

  • Short duration (10-15 minutes)
  • Unique graphic style
  • Surreal horror

Future updates:

- If you bought this game all other parts of the trilogy will be available to you on the day of their release! 

(If you supported "Sacred Family", you will not have to buy other "Human Values" games.)

- Content updates during the creation of the entire trilogy.

Follow the development of my second game here: https://yalokin92.itch.io/my-perfect-blue
